node.detail_zh: 患者為癌症病人，入住伊利沙伯醫院 A6 內科病房。與第 #1513 及 #1563 宗個案患者曾於同時段入住同一病格，為同一內科病房內第三名確診患者。7 月 13 日開始發燒，其後情況惡化，延至 8 月 18 日下午 5 時 58 分離世。
node.detail_en: The patient is a cancer patient and was admitted to the medical ward of Queen Elizabeth Hospital. She was staying in the same cubicle as patients #1513 and #1563 and is the third patient in the ward to be diagnosed. She started having fever on July 13, her conditions deteriorated, and she passed away at 5:58 p.m., August 18.
node.classification_zh: 本地個案的密切接觸者

groups.name_zh: 伊利沙伯醫院 A6 內科病房
groups.name_en: Queen Elizabeth Hospital's A6 internal medicine ward
groups.description_zh: 群組首名患者因長期病患於 7 月 12 日入住伊利沙伯醫院 A6 內科病房，其後入住同一病房的 7 名病人先後確診。
groups.description_en: The first patient of the cluster was admitted to medical ward A6 at Queen Elizabeth Hospital on July 12. Other seven patients of the ward have thereafter been diagnosed positive for the virus.

node.location_en: Kwai Tung House, Tung Tau Estate (II)
